page.title: 15Harvest Services in Well
page.content: This annual service takes place in late October in the Methodist Chapel on a Sunday and Monday. The ladies transform the plain interior of the chapel using flowers and fruits grown locally. The congregation normally about 15 swells to over 150 for the Monday evening service as local people, farmers and friends from other villages gather to give thanks.After the service a splendid harvest supper is served followed by the auction of the harvest gifts,flowers,fruits etc. The money so readily given helps to keep alive the Methodist tradition in the village. The C of E service, supper and auction occur on a Friday early in October. The decorations stay in the church and are given away on Monday.
